subsections.description: There are 6 generators around the map that give power to the surrounding areas. Interact on a generator to start the process, then stand on the metal floor until it's fully powered. Later during the game, the generators can be attacked by Templars. If the Templars successfully unpower a generator, it can be powered again the same way.

pic.alt: Generator 1 - in spawn
Generator 2 - between spawn and the Workshop
Generator 3 - between spawn and the Workshop
Generator 4 - in No Man's Land
Generator 5 - in No Man's Land
Generator 6 - behind the Church
Templars attacking a generator

subsections.description: Once all 6 power generators are active, the Pack-a-Punch machine will be unlocked at the top of the Excavation Site.

pic.alt: Pack-a-Punch machine

subsections.description: There are 3 Giant Robots that occasionally walk through the map. Thor walks through the trenches, Odin walks across the Excavation Site, and Freya walks by the Church. The Giant Robots always walk on the same footprints, and red lights will blink before they step in the footprint. Being stepped on will instantly down you. Sometimes, one of the 2 feet will have a yellow circle on the bottom that can be shot to open a door. Being stepped on with the door opened will take you to the Giant Robot's head.

pic.alt: Flashing red lights around footprint
Foot with no door
Foot with a door
Shooting the door open

subsections.description: Around the map there are small piles of dirt and skulls that you can dig for rewards. Each player must first find a shovel around the map, then they can dig unlimited piles. It is recommended to wait for the map to be snowing before digging so the Ice Staff parts can be found quicker.

pic.alt: A shovel
Location to dig

subsections.description: The Tank can be ridden around the map and moves between the Church and the Tank Station by Generator 2. It always starts in the Church, and moving the tank costs 500 points.

pic.alt: The Tank in the Church

subsections.description: Each player has 3 trials they can complete, and there is an additional fourth trial shared between all players. The trials can be seen next to Generators 1 and 6. Hover over a trial to view the requirements and interact to get the reward. Each player will see their character's name above their trials. Upon powering up Generator 1 the first time, the ritual box will spawn a power-up that can be collected at any time. It is recommended to keep the power-up for a later step if it's a Zombie Blood.

pic.alt: Rituals seen by Generator 1
Rituals seen by Generator 6
Zombie Blood power-up in the ritual box by Generator 1
Quick Revive - near Generator 1
Mule Kick - downstairs at the Excavation Site
Speed Cola - near Generator 3
Stamin-Up - near Generator 5
Juggernog - near Generator 4
Wunderfizz location 1 - near Generator 1
Wunderfizz location 2 - near Generator 2
Wunderfizz location 3 - near Generator 3
Wunderfizz location 4 - near Generator 4
Wunderfizz location 5 - near Generator 5
Wunderfizz location 6 - near Generator 6
Location 1 - downstairs in the Workshop
Location 2 - in the Wind Tunnel near Generator 4
Location 3 - downstairs in the Church

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located between Generator 1 and Generator 3 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in a wheelbarrow near the door to spawn
Location 2 - at the end of the Fire Tunnel
Location 3 - in the trench between Generator 3 and Speed Cola

subsections.description: Located in Giant Robot footprints around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the right footprint between the Excavation Site and Generator 5
Location 2 - in the right footprint between the Excavation Site and Generator 4
Location 3 - in the right footprint by Generator 4

subsections.description: Located between Generator 1 and Generator 2 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - next to a wheelbarrow near the door to spawn
Location 2 - in the Giant Robot footprint on the roof of the Tank Station next to Generator 2
Location 3 - in a wheelbarrow at the end of the trench past the door to the Workshop

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Each player can equip the shield.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Wind Tunnel near Generator 4

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located near the Church (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the mud in front of the Tank's path
Location 2 - in the mud behind the Tank's path
Location 3 - at the end of the Ice Tunnel

subsections.description: Located in spawn.

pic.alt: Brain location

subsections.description: Located around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - at the top of the Excavation Site, to the PaP machine's right
Location 2 - at the top of the secret stairs, to the left of the Gramophone table
Location 3 - on some scaffolding next to the statues

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Only 1 player can equip the Maxis Drone.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Church (TODO move to Workshop?)

subsections.description: The Gramophone and Black Record are required to build(TODO) the staffs.

step.title: Find the Black Record
step.description: Located around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - at the start of the ramp going from the Workshop door to the top of the Excavation Site
Location 2 - in a wheelbarrow to the left of the Pack-a-Punch machine
Location 3 - on the wall between Generator 5 and the Church

step.title: Pick up the Gramophone
step.description: Located down the stairs at the Excavation Site (2 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - to the right of the table
Location 2 - to the left of the table

step.title: Unlock the secret stairs
step.description: After getting the Gramophone and Black Record, place the Gramophone on the table down the stairs at the Excavation Site. Once the stairs have opened, you can pick up the Gramophone. The Gramophone can only be placed in one location around the map at a time, and must be picked up before it can be placed in a new location. When the Gramophone is picked up, it is accessible for all players to place it down somewhere else.

pic.alt: Gramophone on the table to unlock the secret stairs

step.title: Find the Fire Record
step.description: Located near the Church (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the pillar by the stairs that lead upstairs into the Church (seen easier after the Tank is moved)
Location 2 - on a pew upstairs in the Church
Location 3 - on a box by Generator 6
Location 1 - to the right of Stamin-Up
Location 2 - on some boxes outside the entrance to the Lightning Tunnel
Location 3 - on a table inside the entrance of the Lightning Tunnel
Location 1 - on a cart between Generator 4 and the Excavation Site
Location 2 - to the left of Juggernog
Location 3 - at the end of the Wind Tunnel

step.title: Find the Ice Record
step.description: Located in the Tank Station by Generator 2 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a desk by the door leading to Generator 2
Location 2 - to the right of the Mystery Box location
Location 3 - on some shelves by the exit to the mud Tank path

sections.description: Complete the shared bottom trial of the Rituals of the Ancients. Taking(TODO) the reward will upgrade your melee attack to a powerful punch.

subsections.description: There are 4 chests in the Giant Robot footprints that must be filled with zombie souls. Kill enough zombies next to each chests until they disappear. If a Giant Robot steps on the chest, its progress will be reset.

pic.alt: Chest 1 - by the Excavation Site
Chest 2 - next to Generator 4
Chest 3 - next to Generator 5
Chest 4 - by the Church

subsections.description: All players can now go to either of the 2 Rituals of the Ancients locations and claim the reward(TODO).

pic.alt: Glowing reward at the bottom
One Inch Punch reward

sections.description: Each player must cleanse a tablet to unlock the G-Strike Beacon.

subsections.description: Go to the Tank Station next to Generator 2. In the back of the room, there is a table with 4 tablets on it. Each player can take one tablet.

pic.alt: Table with tablets

subsections.header: Cleanse the Tablet in the Church
subsections.description: Place the tablet in the holy water upstairs in the Church. Get melee kills next to the tablet until enough zombie souls have been collected.

pic.alt: Tablet in the holy water

subsections.header: Carefully Carry the Tablet to the Tank Station
subsections.description: Pick up the tablet from the holy water, then walk back to the Tank Station without touching any mud. If you step on any mud on the way back, you have to cleanse it in the Church again. Place the cleansed tablet on the original table in the Tank Station.

pic.alt: Table to place cleansed tablet

subsections.description: Get more melee kills next to the tablet until the G-Strike Beacon appears on the table. Interact to pick up the G-Strike Beacon.

pic.alt: G-Strike Beacon

subsections.description: Interact with 3 green Element 115 meteorites.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in spawn, near the door to Generator 3
Location 2 - in the Workshop, near the door to No Man's Land
Location 3 - on some scaffolding near Pack-a-Punch

subsections.description: Interact with 3 radios.

pic.alt: Location 1 - downstairs at the Excavation Site, on some scaffolding
Location 2 - in The Crazy Place, hugging the wall between the Fire and Lightning sections
Location 3 - in the Freya Giant Robot that walks by the Church

subsections.description: Go prone and interact on both number 1 icons at Generator 1, then do the same for one of the number 5 icons at Generator 5.

pic.alt: Number 1 icon at Generator 1
Number 5 icon at Generator 5

sections.description: Play (TODO Remember Forever) and get a Max Ammo (Black Ops III only)

subsections.description: Interact with a Samantha doll by TODO. A particle effect will show the game has started. Then, find and shoot 5 Samantha dolls around the map. They will play a song when you get close, and only 1 will be in the map at a time. If you run out of time, Samantha will laugh, and you have to start the game again at the original doll.

pic.alt: The doll to start hide and seek
Location 1 - TODO

subsections.description: Go back to the original doll and interact again. This time, you'll get a Max Ammo and the song will play.

pic.alt: The doll to get the Max Ammo and song
